name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, an indoor music festival in Tianjin was cancelled because one of the Japanese bands, Crystal Lake, had endorsed a guitar brand called ESP, which was accused of "calling back the spirits of Japanese militarism."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Click with caution] On the evening of September 16, a knife murder occurred near the Liu Clan Guild Hall in Pei County, Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province. A man killed a woman and then fled. It is said that it was due to emotional reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[How much money should be handed over until you can sleep peacefully]
On September 12, the Second Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University in Jiangxi Province issued a notice, announcing the anti-corruption account of the Jiangxi Provincial Health Commission, requiring every employee to hand over the ill-gotten gains from the 18th National Congress (since 2012).
It also stated that the amount of money to be handed over is based on how much you have handed over so that you can sleep peacefully.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[I am not a spy]
The first class of the new semester taught by a foreign teacher at Shanghai Normal University Tianhua College

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Errata: the Shenzhen venue was cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 16, someone on Baidu Tieba revealed that a picture on the Apple Watch Specialist one-on-one purchase page on Apple's official website was suspected of insulting China.
Netizens said that the photo of this employee has squinty eyes, wide eyes, bulbous nose, master's mole, Mongolian face, and pigtail, which is a stereotype specifically targeting Chinese people on the Chinese official website.
The news triggered dissatisfaction of netizens inside the wall against Apple.
Later, it was said that this employee was actually an Indian. And the English page was also him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @dacheng_11 The topic of “Apple official website stereotypes” is now the second most popular topic on Tieba. It is expected to become a hot topic on Weibo soon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, the Hechang Sales Office in Luoyang, Henan Province, blocked the road to protest against the delay in the delivery of the property.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens tested Wenxin Yiyan and found that when asked some sensitive questions, Wenxin Yiyan would automatically exit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, a paralyzed girl described on Bilibili that she encountered an "unprecedented" body search at Urumqi Airport. As a disabled person, she not only did not receive the respect and convenience that should have belonged to disabled people, but instead encountered all kinds of difficulties at the airport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, when parents of primary and secondary school students across the country are strongly opposing pre-prepared meals, CCTV launched the "Pre-prepared Meal Competition" program. The program will select the top ten delicious pre-prepared meals from all over the country, my favorite pre-prepared meal, the most local pre-prepared meal and other awards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, Jiangxi Normal University also began to require teachers and students to download the national anti-fraud app.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, multiple security checks were implemented on trains departing from Shanghai and other places to Zhejiang and cities hosting the Asian Games.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 15, a homeowner protested on the streets of Zhengzhou, saying that 75 square meters of his 145-square-meter house was shared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, netizens photographed volunteers for the Hangzhou Asian Games rehearsing a welcome ceremony in the rain, with one volunteer every three meters.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 16, the media reported that a farmer in Wenchang, Hainan, reported being raped by a fruit vendor. The police decided not to file a case because the existing evidence could not prove that a crime had occurred. 
Eight days later, the farmer committed suicide to show her determination. Later, the police said they had found new evidence and decided to file a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 17, at the Sun Yat-sen Mausoleum in Nanjing, a man riding a bicycle had an argument with the security guard of the scenic spot, presumably because shared bicycles were prohibited from entering the scenic spot.
During the dispute, the security guard slapped the man, causing the two sides to scuffle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Extremely misogynistic articles can enter campus]
Recently, a "Xinyang No. 2 High School Chinese Reading" material has sparked heated discussions. According to the pictures circulated online, this article titled "Xi'an Concert Incident Should Arouse Our High Level of Vigilance and Reflection" accused "many girls of taking out naked loans and sleeping with men to watch expensive concerts" and "spending money for medical treatment and marriage with their boyfriends to buy tickets to watch concerts."
The article also said, "There is something wrong with the ideology of this generation of girls" and "the cliff-like decline in the number of newborns is absolutely related to modern women."
"Women nowadays only think about enjoying themselves, and when they get married they make excessive demands on men." "Men can't satisfy women's demands even if they work like cows and horses. It's too difficult! Why are they still unsatisfied?"
"Women who are addicted to consumerism should recognize the situation, embrace the life they should have, be frugal and run the household, and have children. This is the responsibility they should bear."
It is said that the reading material was selected by Hu Shixin, the head of the Chinese language group of Xinyang No. 2 High School
Xinyang No. 2 High School stated, "Although Hu subjectively wanted to use social hot spots to educate students to establish correct values, he was not rigorous in selecting materials. We deeply apologize for the controversy caused by this."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 14, a Shandong Xiaohongshu netizen said: His school notified that students who encounter telecommunications fraud should not call the police directly, but contact the class teacher and security department first. All those who are defrauded will be punished.
According to the comment area, the reason is that the higher authorities are strict in cracking down on college students' telecommunications fraud. After the college students call the police, the police will inform the school, and the school will deduct points.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, a person jumped from a building at Guangzhou Huashang University. The scene was cordoned off and people were driven out. A large sheet of cloth was used to block the view. The school is blocking the news. Tonight's military training was also cancelled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 17, a comic exhibition held in Tianjie Shopping Mall in Jiangning District, Nanjing was reported, and the special police rushed to the scene and shut down the exhibition. There are two versions of the reasons for the report. One is that Japanese songs were played, and the other is that someone cosplayed as an assassin who assassinated Shinzo Abe and was reported. According to the contributor, there were also law enforcement officers on the scene who used their mobile phones to check which work the coser's character was from.
